title: Three Oh Nine
lyrics:
So they tell me
Hold him while you can
And you show me
How it is to know a man
And it all seems right
When we talk through the night



How could I know

How this would go?



It's a first for me

It's a pain I need

It's too good to be

Please don't leave

Please don't leave



So I let go

Moments at a time

'Cause I know soon

I am losing what is mine

But I say too much

To justify your touch



How could I know

How this would go?



It's a first for me

It's a pain I need

It's too good to be

Please don't leave

It's a first for me

It's a pain I need

It's too good to be

Please don't leave

Please don't leave
